detail_desc: Soft handbag in grained imitation leather with two handles and a zip at the top and an adjustable, detachable shoulder strap with carabiner hooks at both ends. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 13x25x29 cm.
Shorter, fitted top in a fine rib knit with a turtle neck and long sleeves.

Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband designed to hold in and shape the waist that also contains a concealed key pocket. Legs with mesh details, an opening for the heels and anti-slip protectors on the soles of the feet for a better grip when practising without a yoga mat.
Single-breasted jacket in a linen and viscose weave with notch lapels and flap welt front pockets. Lined.
Espadrilles in fabric with a braided trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Calf-length dress in a patterned, crinkled viscose weave with a halter neck and smocking at the top. Seam at the waist and a softly draping flared skirt. Unlined.
Trousers in stretch cotton twill with a high, foldover waist and detachable twill belt with a metal buckle. Zip fly with a press-stud, and front and back pockets.
T-shirts in soft jersey with a wide neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a gently rounded hem.
Spotted tights with an elasticated waist.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Soft suede handbag with two handles, a detachable shoulder strap and zip at the top. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Fabric lining. Size 12x28x31 cm.
Fitted lace dress with 3/4 length sleeves with a flounce at the end. Opening down the back with a button at the back of the neck and concealed zip at the hem. Lined.

Lined, ribbed bikini top with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, adjustable, elastic shoulder straps and matching elastic between the cups. Metal fastener at the back.
Jersey trousers in a sturdy cotton blend with an elasticated waist and legs with sewn-in creases.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Blouse in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Slightly wider neckline with a V-shaped opening at the back and ties at the back of the neck, long raglan sleeves, and smocking at the waist and cuffs.
Metal Alice band with a metal chain with pendants and plastic beads in various designs and sizes.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, gathered yoke at the back, long sleeves with a slit and narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in soft, garter-stitched organic cotton. Jumper with a button placket, long raglan sleeves and raw, roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and raw, roll-edge hems.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

Small shoulder bag in soft imitation leather with pleats, a short, chunky metal chain shoulder strap and a concealed zip at the top. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Depth 7 cm. Height 16 cm. Width 28 cm.

Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap and an imitation suede flap with a fastener. One inner compartment and one outer compartment with a zip. Lined. Height 18 cm. Width 23 cm.

Set with a top and a dungaree dress in soft cotton. Top in jersey with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short, frill-trimmed sleeves. Dungaree dress in woven fabric with a chest pocket, elastication at the back of the waist and straps with adjustable buttoning. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with embroidered text at the top.
Thigh-high over-the-knee socks in a soft, rib-knit modal blend.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit viscose with a text print in a relaxed, wide fit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Loafers in imitation suede with moccasin seams, decorative laces, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Double-layered hat in soft fleece with appliqués at the top, a print motif on the front and earflaps.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Baby Exclusive. Set with a vest top and pair of puff pants in a soft organic cotton double weave. Vest top with narrow shoulder straps and puff pants with elastication at the waist and legs. Lined.
Short dress woven in a cotton blend with flounces in a narrow cut at the top with a concealed zip at the back and ties and hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck. Lined.

Knee-length coat in woven fabric with a filling of 70% recycled down and 30% recycled feathers. High collar, concealed press-studs down the front, welt side pockets and a detachable, elasticated belt with a large plastic buckle at the waist. Lined. The polyester content of the coat is recycled.
Jacket in cotton denim with a collar, frill trims and press-studs down the front and at the cuffs.
Knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Calf-length, crocheted skirt that is fitted at the top and relaxes at the knees. High waist and a jersey lining made from recycled polyester.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Calf-length dress in a patterned weave. Square neckline with decorative gathers at the front and a concealed zip at the back. Short puff sleeves with smocked hems, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a slit at the front. Unlined.
Fabric trainers with concealed elastication at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Cable-knit jumper in a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck top in woven fabric with short, flounced sleeves.
Gilet in faux fur with a faceted button at the top. Patterned lining.
Bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a rounded lace collar and press-studs at the back of the neck. Long, puff sleeves with a narrow trim at the cuffs, and press-studs at the crotch.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft rib knit with long sleeves, a detachable tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides.
Metal waist belt with round links, a carabiner hook at one end and a round metal loop at the other. Width approx. 2 cm.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in stretch fabric with narrow shoulder straps.
Quilted top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in an airy jacquard weave with a small, frilled collar, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck, and long balloon sleeves with narrow, frill-trimmed, buttoned cuffs.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a sewn-in wrapover at the front, concealed fastening and a zip in one side and a wide, asymmetric flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket with a decorative button, and ribbed hems.

Chinos in premium cotton twill with an extended waistband and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Shirt in woven fabric with a lined, drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Sleeveless, ankle-length jumpsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front and seam with a sewn-in tie belt at the waist. Concealed zip and at the back, concealed pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs. Lined at the top.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Wide, cropped jersey T-shirt with a print motif on the front.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist, flounces with overlocked edges at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an extra-firm, tight fit that focuses on the thighs. The tights create pressure on the legs that is highest at the hems and is gradually reduced towards the top to aid circulation. The special design and high elastane content help the tights to retain their effect and properties over a long period. Elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, mesh key pocket in the waistband and reflective details.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton and linen blend with a concealed button-down collar and classic front. Open chest pocket, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with an accentuated waist and narrow shoulders to create a fitted silhouette.

Shirt in washed stretch cotton twill with fabric appliqués, a print motif, and a detachable, lined hood in sweatshirt fabric. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Shirt in airy linen with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Long skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist and high slits in the sides. Short underskirt.

Set with a top in cotton jersey and dungaree dress in a cotton weave. Top with a round neck and short sleeves. Dress with adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, and elastication at the back of the waist. Unlined.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Slightly shorter, wide jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend with dropped shoulders and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sports jacket in sturdy, double-layer jersey with a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, side pockets, a drawstring at the hem and ribbing at the cuffs. Narrow elastication at the hem and reflective details. Unlined. Size of chest pocket 14x26cm.
Satin-covered Alice band with floral decorations on top.
Skinny-fit jeans in soft, stretch satin with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly with a button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a button placket and chest pocket .

Short-sleeved shirt in a stretch cotton weave with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, yoke and darts at the back and a rounded hem. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders, gently tapered sleeves and an accentuated waist to create a flattering silhouette.
Scarf in a patterned cotton weave. Size 50x50 cm.

Shirt in premium cotton Oxford with a button-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
